programme.title: Devil's Canyon
programme.desc: An outlaw woman (Virginia Mayo) helps one Arizona convict (Dale Robertson) stop another (Stephen McNally) with a Gatling gun.

programme.title: Jeremiah Johnson
programme.desc: A recluse mountain man becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by Indians, and proves to be a match for their warriors.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A young man arrives in North Fork to claim the body of his dead brother.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A gunman threatens to kill Micah and Lucas tries to help.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is accused of murder by a man who claims to be an eyewitness.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark deliberately disobeys his father and a convicted prisoner escapes.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas' friends label him a tinhorn because of his gambling.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A blind banjo-playing wanderer strikes up an acquaintance with Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The McCains get new neighbors when a couple moves into a nearby ranch.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Two crooks steal a diamond collection and hide it in Pat's chicken feed.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: An outlaw who killed a sheriff frames Randy Barker who depends upon Gene to clear his name.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Grandpa Decker unwittingly uses his property as a hideout for a trio of outlaws.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Gene attempts to help the relationship between the rebelling Ray Saunders and his father.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: A woman desperately strives to conceal her past in the circus by refusing to allow the carnival to come to town.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: A confidence man deceives a female sheriff despite warnings from Gene.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Gene and Pat are insurance investigators trying to put an end to a series of bank shipment robberies.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Crooked men take advantage of two codgers who are still fighting the Civil War.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Bill is brought to the Governor by two bounty hunters, and he's hired to become Marshal of border-town being controlled by an outlaw called El Sombro; Bill learns his old mentor is the current sheriff and he's become an ineffective drunk.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: After acting Marshall Bill decrees that no guns would be allowed on Rio Nada's streets, a casino owner hires two notorious gunmen to kill him.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: A man in black (Yul Brynner) recruits six hired guns to lead Mexican villagers against the gang of an outlaw (Eli Wallach).

programme.title: Return of the Seven
programme.desc: The man in black (Yul Brynner) forms a new Magnificent Seven, to save Mexican farmers from slave labor.

programme.title: Guns of the Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: A mercenary (George Kennedy) recruits a knife man (James Whitmore), a gunman (Monte Markham) and four outlaws to free a Mexican patriot from prison.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!
programme.desc: A marshal (Lee Van Cleef), an Eastern reporter and five ex-convicts rescue widows from Mexican bandits.

programme.title: Pale Rider
programme.desc: A mysterious preacher protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.
